description: This file defines the main index route component for a calendar scheduler web application, including state management, event handling, and rendering of calendar UI components.

methods.name: Index
methods.description: Main React component for the calendar index page, managing calendar state, event interactions, and rendering UI.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the list of events from the data source.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initiate creation of a new event, optionally with a specified date.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Save an event (create or update) and refresh the calendar.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Delete an event by ID and refresh the calendar.
